resources.string: Reports and Sustainings\n\nWhen on, Reports and Sustainings will be excluded.
History\n\nWhen on, talks that have been read will be excluded
Read in App\n\nWhen on, Talks will be opened in the App as opposed to Gospel Library or a Browser
This will force a check for any missing talks in your database (this should have occurred when you updated the app.) Would you like to proceed?
WARNING: This will wipe and reset your talk database and history. Would you like to proceed?

How to Use:\nFor a completely random talk leave all fields blank, to filter the talk fill in the desired fields.\n To generate the talk click the bottom left button. To go to the Current Talk click the bottom right button.
Are you certain you want to delete the entire history?
